mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_wechat_userinfo( userId, subscribe, nickname, sex, city, country, province, language, headimgurl, subscribe_time, unionid, remark, groupid, openid, privilege ) VALUES ( #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subscribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headimgurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subscribeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openid,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{privilege,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
